name: Tokimochi
description: A chewy rice-based time-altering snack. Eating these will make time fly by!

name: Golden Tokimochi
description: A golden mochi ball that speeds up time. It tastes like metal.

name: Yarinaoshi Cube
description: A little glowing box. Squeeze it tight and it'll drag you right back to your youth. You won't remember anything, though.

name: Golden Yarinaoshi Cube
description: A brightly glowing box. Squeezing it will send you back in time, with your memories and skills intact.

name: Momotarou Whistle
description: Blow this whistle at the edge of a river and a momotarou baby will float to you.
